ygData.msgSnippet: ... Splitclaw is about 25 ish.  He isn t THAT rare as i ve seen him and i m not in the area often.  ANyhow i talked to someone who killed him and he didn t
ygData.messageBody:
>
> about named gnoll :
>
> last night i was hunting at the gnoll reaver and undead reaver spot
> and i have see a rare spawn a gnoll named splitclaw (no sure of the
> exact name) it cons red to me at lvl 17. he also has summoned a
> pet (a skeleton ) wich cons white to me.
>

Splitclaw is about 25 ish. He isn't THAT rare as i've seen him and
i'm not in the area often. ANyhow i talked to someone who killed him
and he didn't have anything out of the ordinary. Just words or
something.

---ralph
